ProjectTitle: Identifying disease-critical cell types and pathways to guide new treatment approaches for Houge-Janssens syndrome type 2 (HJS2)
InitialFeedbackHistory: 19/12/2024 Please note that you used an older DMP template, please use the [REDACTED] standard DMP template that you can find in DMPonline.be or on our website https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp/dmp for your future DMPs. [REDACTED] [REDACTED] list human cells in your data table which are human bodily material under the biobank law, please make sure you have ethical approval to work with these cells before starting the experiments and add you S nummer in the DMP, for more information see: https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/humanmaterial. [REDACTED] [REDACTED] use of external hard drives and external clouds (dropbox) is not very secure, you can consult the storage guide for solutions recommended by ICTS https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en [REDACTED] please note that the KU [REDACTED] policy asks for 10 years of data preservation, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
